_ARTIFACT_WARNING: These results are artifacts of the cold-start extraction methodology, which discards the KV-cache accumulated during M4's multi-pass loop. All values show chance-level accuracy (~2.4%) regardless of corruption level, including the zero-corruption control. These data do not reflect M4's true corruption robustness and should not be cited. See manuscript Section 4.2 note and Section 6 (M4 experimental coverage) for details.
